summary: Several strangers in Los Angeles weave their stories of loss and hope, not knowing that their lives have brushed up against each others in small but sometimes profound ways.
cast: Ellen Albertini Dow|Eric Burdon|Paul Dillon|Catherine Garedakis|Sarah Jones|Karen Kondazian|Sophia Malki|Austin Marques|Vanessa McCaffrey|Joel McKinnon Miller|Alyssa Milano|Rachel Miner|Derrick O'Connor|Baadja-Lyne Odums|Larry Wang Parrish|Emily Rios|Ross Romero|Andres Xavier Sanchez|Peter Alexander Santiago|Cy Shim|Nick Slatkin|Randi Tahara|Yorick van Wageningen|Clarence Williams III|Renn Woods|Mhair Zeitounian
title: The Blue Hour
